text:
I have worked on couple of behavioural psychological and psychophysical experiments, its time to delve into cortical basis of behaviour. 

Over the next six weeks, I will try to build and start EEG systems needed for ERP research. @_nightsweekends @_buildspace. https://t.co/x1Ufnu7hpU

user_info.name: Pushkar Singh
user_info.description: Looking to join a team who are building something. Currently building full stack applications with react js and mongodb.
